fields.label: Policy Number
fields.summary: Enter the policy number.

fields.label: Claim Reference Number
fields.summary: Enter the claim reference number.

fields.label: Birth Certificate
fields.summary: Submit the birth certificate issued by PSA or Local Civil Registry.

fields.label: Death Certificate with Post-Mortem Examination
fields.summary: Submit the death certificate issued by PSA or Local Civil Registry.

fields.label: Photocopy of Contract of Burial and Funeral Services
fields.summary: Provide a photocopy of the contract.

fields.label: Official Receipts of Medical Expenses
fields.summary: Attach official receipts for medical expenses.

fields.label: Autopsy Report
fields.summary: Submit the autopsy report if available.

fields.label: Photocopy of Hospital Records
fields.summary: Provide photocopies of hospital records if available.

fields.label: Marriage Certificate
fields.summary: Submit the marriage certificate if applicable.

fields.label: Official Receipts of Burial and Funeral Services
fields.summary: Attach receipts only if claiming under accidental burial expense coverage.

fields.label: Completed Personal Accident Claim Form
fields.summary: Fill out and submit the claim form.

fields.label: Attending Physicianâ€™s Statement or Medical Certificate
fields.summary: Provide the physician's statement or medical certificate.

fields.label: Police Investigation Report or Statement of Witness/es
fields.summary: Submit the police report or witness statements.

fields.label: Valid IDs of the Insured and Beneficiary
fields.summary: Provide valid IDs, including at least one government-issued ID.

fields.label: Complete Medical Records
fields.summary: Submit medical records showing proof of disability.

fields.label: Photos of amputated/aï¬€ected body parts of the Insured
fields.summary: Include photos of the affected body parts.

fields.label: Statement of Account (SOA) with Admission and Discharge Date
fields.summary: Provide the statement of account for medical reimbursement.

fields.label: Date Received
fields.summary: Enter the date the claim was received.

fields.label: Time Received
fields.summary: Enter the time the claim was received.

fields.label: Receiving Dept./Office
fields.summary: Specify the department or office receiving the claim.

fields.label: Full Name
fields.summary: Enter the full name of the witness.
